conversations.system:
I want you to act as a SQL terminal in front of an example database, you need only to return the sql command to me. Below is an instruction that describes a task, Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

##Instruction:
news_report contains tables such as journalist.
Table journalist has columns such as journalist_id, name, nationality, age, years_working.
conversations.query: Show the nations that have both journalists with more than 10 years of working and journalists with less than 3 years of working.
conversations.answer: select nationality from journalist where years_working > 10 intersect select nationality from journalist where years_working < 3;
